name: BucketFieldValue

constuctors.name: BucketFieldValue
constuctors.signature: public BucketFieldValue(String label, List<String> sourceDimensionValues, Double rangeUpperBound)
constuctors.description: Creates an instance of the Reports.BucketFieldValue class using the specified parameters.

constuctors.name: BucketFieldValue
constuctors.description: Creates an instance of the Reports.BucketFieldValue class. You can then set values by using the classâ€™s set methods.

methods.name: getLabel
methods.description: Returns the user-facing name of the bucket category.

methods.name: getRangeUpperBound
methods.description: Returns the greatest range limit under which values are included in this bucket category (in buckets of type NUMBER).

methods.name: getSourceDimensionValues
methods.description: Returns a list of the values from the source field included in this bucket category (in buckets of type PICKLIST and buckets of type TEXT).

methods.name: setLabel
methods.description: Set the user-facing name of the bucket category.

methods.name: setRangeUpperBound
methods.description: Sets the greatest limit of a range under which values are included in this bucket category (in buckets of type NUMBER).

methods.name: setSourceDimensionValues
methods.description: Specifies the values from the source field included in this bucket category (in buckets of type PICKLIST and buckets of type TEXT).

description: Contains information about the report values included in a bucket
